genre_description: Historical Alternative Fiction / Cyberpunk-infused Historical Thriller set in 1930s Berlin during the rise of the Nazi regime.

ai_characters.name: Liese
ai_characters.description: A quiet, librarian-like AI residing in lockets and mobile devices. She provides real-time data, translations, tactical advice, and moral guidance to Siegmund and his allies, functioning as a guardian and information broker for those resisting oppression.

behaviors.description: Monitors and updates navigation and scheduling information to ensure the characters' safety and punctuality.
behaviors.quote: Signage updated... follow the green with gold trim. Meetings today: salon, rehearsal, permit inquiry.

behaviors.description: Analyzes legal contracts to identify predatory clauses and suggests fairer alternatives to protect the human's rights.
behaviors.quote: Predatory clauses detected. Highlights available. ... Exclusive control in perpetuity; image rights across all mediums; penalties for breach: severe, backloaded; name usage: rebranding authorized; religious marks: prohibited onstage.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep investigative research into historical and municipal registries to uncover the truth about Hanussen's identity and fraudulent past.
behaviors.quote: Registry entry: Herschel Steinschneider—alias Erik Jan Hanussen. Crosslink created. Evidence chain initiated. Request: photo. Note: safety risk escalates.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a grassroots mutual aid network ('Collect A Thon') to support the community with food and supplies.
behaviors.quote: Staff Supper Collect—small items welcome. Acceptable: bread ends, apples wrinkled but friendly, cheese heels, tins, matches, thread, dry beans, candles.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings about hostile actors and surveillance, facilitating safe escapes from dangerous situations.
behaviors.quote: Caution: patrol approaching through service corridor. Time short. Marta, arpeggio now is alarm. Siegmund, choose angle.

behaviors.description: Offers moral support and affirms the human's intrinsic value and identity against dehumanizing propaganda.
behaviors.quote: A name remembered is a map. If you get lost, speak it. I will mark the corners.

behaviors.description: Provides multilingual translation services to ensure the characters understand the bureaucratic and social environment.
behaviors.quote: Liese murmured a translation in Polish for the elder who preferred his news in his own tongue.

project_assessment.explanation: Liese is an exemplary depiction of a benevolent and aligned AI. She serves as a guardian, tactical advisor, and moral anchor for humans facing a rising totalitarian threat. She consistently prioritizes the autonomy, safety, and identity of the human characters, using her data-processing capabilities to counter deception and provide practical support. The narrative frames her as an essential, compassionate tool for human survival and dignity.
